action.description: The committee(s) on  HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HWN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Richards, Keohokalole; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) DeCorte; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) San Buenaventura.
